body_html:
The times on GPU are correct, our initial measurements were wrong. I am really sorry for that.

The difference in performance on CPU is caused by the fact that during the backward phase recent versions of pytorch (newer than @65b6626) use more than the number of OpenMP threads set programmatically.
body_text:
The times on GPU are correct, our initial measurements were wrong. I am really sorry for that.
The difference in performance on CPU is caused by the fact that during the backward phase recent versions of pytorch (newer than @65b6626) use more than the number of OpenMP threads set programmatically.
body:
The times on GPU are correct, our initial measurements were wrong. I am really sorry for that.

The difference in performance on CPU is caused by the fact that during the backward phase recent versions of pytorch (newer than @65b6626) use more than the number of OpenMP threads set programmatically.
